text: Four Rooms is a 1995 American comedy movie set in a hotel on New Year's Eve. It has four different stories: * Honeymoon Suite - "The Missing Ingredient" * Room 404 - "The Wrong Man" * Room 309 - "The Misbehavers" * Penthouse - "The Man from Hollywood" The cast includes Tim Roth, Jennifer Beals, Madonna, Marisa Tomei, Antonio Banderas, Quentin Tarantino, and others. Four Rooms got negative reviews from the critics. However, the movie earned back just beyond its actual budget. Category:1995 comedy movies Category:1990s black comedy movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies set in hotels Category:American independent movies
title: Four Rooms
